{
    "number": 191129,
    "data": "1,3,5,9,13,15,21,27,37,39,45,53,61,63,81,85,109,111,117,135,149,157,159,181,183,189,213,243,245,253,255,325,327,333,341,351,405,437,445,447,469,471,477,541,543,549,567,597,629,637,639,725,729,733,735,757,759,765,853,973,975,981,999,1013,1021,1023,1053,1215,1301",
    "name": "Increasing sequence generated by these rules:  a(1)=1, and if x is in a then 3x and 4x+1 are in a.",
    "comment": [
        "See A191113."
    ],
    "link": [
        "Reinhard Zumkeller, <a href=\"/A191129/b191129.txt\">Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..10000</a>"
    ],
    "mathematica": [
        "h = 3; i = 0; j = 4; k = 1; f = 1; g = 9;",
        "a = Union[Flatten[NestList[{h # + i, j # + k} &, f, g]]]  (* A191129 *)",
        "b = a/3; c = (a-1)/4; r = Range[1, 1500];",
        "d = Intersection[b, r] (* A191182 *)",
        "e = Intersection[c, r] (* A191183 *)"
    ],
    "program": [
        "(Haskell)",
        "import Data.Set (singleton, deleteFindMin, insert)",
        "a191129 n = a191129_list !! (n-1)",
        "a191129_list = f $ singleton 1",
        "   where f s = m : (f $ insert (3*m) $ insert (4*m+1) s')",
        "             where (m, s') = deleteFindMin s",
        "-- _Reinhard Zumkeller_, Jun 01 2011"
    ],
    "xref": [
        "Cf. A191113."
    ],
    "keyword": "nonn",
    "offset": "1,2",
    "author": "_Clark Kimberling_, May 27 2011",
    "references": 6,
    "revision": 8,
    "time": "2013-07-13T12:04:10-04:00",
    "created": "2011-05-27T21:59:05-04:00"
